question: In some countries, more and more people are becoming interested in finding out about the history of the house or building they live in.What are the reasons for this?How can people research this?
text: Nowadays, in some nations, for some reason, people who have a house are curious to find out the nature of their living home. Overall, it could be happened due to some backgrounds likewise  understanding the origin of the construction and knowing the previous family who lives in their home.

For the first reason, a family would be very satisfied when they explore the structure of the building. It might be very useful for them to prevent any dangerous situation regarding the disasters or other happenings. For instance, their family member has a question about how long this building was built.In addition, every room has typical characteristics of the wall due to its use. Furthermore, the power of all parts in these rooms must be known.

The second reason is people need to know more about who has lived there in the past. It is such an incredible moment when they know about the secret at their home. For example, there is a tomb in the back or some unpleasant tragedy that could be happened before. Moreover, it makes people scream when it suddenly happens without any information before. However, it does not mean that people have to stop to stay there, they could manage the problem as soon as possible.

In conclusion, many reasons contribute people to do these acts, that is by exploring about the history of building and folk who living there before. Subsequently, it is important to have complete information about the home that people will live in to avoid  unpredictable scary moments.
